name: EduRiser Learning Solutions
tag_list: end-to-end-learning-solutions, learning-solutions, corporate-training, business-simulations, corporate-training-company, instructor-led-training, human-resource-development, leadership-training, training, staff-training-solutions, e-learning, content
overview:
EduRiser is a Global Learning & Development organization which focuses on enhancing organizational performance, developing its functional & behavioral competencies, thereby impacting growth and profitability for our clients.

EduRiser’s core is Content Development, which we effectively deliver through :

  • eLearning
  • Business Simulations
  • ILT
  • Blended Learning.

EduRiser combines its deep domain expertise with innovative technologies to design and deliver learning solutions that impact business performance through improved employee productivity, client profitability and effective skill transformation.

Our high quality learning solutions are developed by leading learning experts to ensure that we deliver custom learning programs tailored to our customers’ needs.

EduRiser’s diligent and action-driven team, with a firm belief in our mission - “Transformation Through Learning”, constantly endeavors transformation of the ‘bottom of the pyramid’ through inputs of knowledge, skills and behavior.

EduRiser takes pride in being the trusted learning partner of leaders from various industries.

The Industry verticals we focus on include -

  • BFSI
    -Telecommunication
  • Automobile
  • Oil
  • Real Estate
  • Logistics
  • IT & ITES
  • FMCG
  • Retail -Pharmaceuticals
  • Engineering & Manufacturing
  • Education

Our Expertise :

eLearning, ePublishing, Business Simulations, Games, Animations & Graphic Design, Localization, HTML5, Assessments, Instructional Designing / Script writing / Story Boarding, ILT, Blended Learning

Our Esteemed clients:

Intel, Jhpiego, Pidlite, NOKIA, , Times Of India, Hindustan Unilever, Asian Paints, LIC, LIC MF, Wipro, ICICI Bank, Tata Motors, MKCL, Hindustan Petroleum, SBI Life, Kotak Mahindra Bank, Max Bupa Health Insurance, , Shapoorji Pallonji & Co. Ltd., Videocon Industries Ltd., Axis Bank, HDFC Bank, UTI Mutual Fund, Abhudaya Bank and many more.
